titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PHARMACOTHERAPY STOP SMOKING AID RECEIVED - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Received Nicotine Replacement Therapy Only (Retired October 2017)
Received both Nicotine Replacement Therapy and bupropion (Zyban) either concurrently or consecutively (Retired October 2017)
Received both Nicotine Replacement Therapy and varenicline (Champix) consecutively (Retired October 2017)
Did not receive either Nicotine Replacement Therapy, bupropion (Zyban) or varenicline (Champix) (Retired October 2017)
Received a combination of licensed nicotine containing products concurrently
Received a licensed nicotine containing product, and/or bupropion and/or varenicline consecutively
Used a combination of a licensed medication and an unlicensed nicotine containing product concurrently
Used a licensed medication and an unlicensed nicotine containing product consecutively
Used an unlicensed nicotine containing product only
Did not use any licensed medication or unlicensed nicotine containing product
